thread.title: EMILY BERAN
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by EMILY BERAN

author: EMILY BERAN
title: EMILY BERAN
text: I was really impressed with the prices I found so I decided to purchase from here. But working with the website has been a nightmare. Everything was easy to find and navigate, but there were just so many issues with page errors and loading issues.
